Source

Class TeleportCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Source.Cell
      • Source.TeleportCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CellInterface

    public class TeleportCell
extends Cell
    A Teleport Cell send the Player to a specific Cell.

    A player is characterized by the following informations :

    • A destination : the cell which will be reached.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leo JUMEL et Brice NUZZO

      • TeleportCell

        public TeleportCell(int idx,
            int destination)
        Teleport Cell constructor

        A Teleport Cell is built with an index and a destination

        Parameters:

        destination - The Cell index where the player is teleported.
